channel.title: Changing what an item sells for in store?
channel.description:
Well, for example, in my server people are selling drag chains for 168m ea at general store, and gettin d chains is easy, there's a command. Is there a way i can change how much they sell for? Lets say like 5mil?
thanks.

item.title: Changing what an item sells for in store?
item.dc:creator: @LeScape_Pk LeScape Pk
item.description:
@LeScape_Pk wrote:

open up items.cfg and search for the dragon chain’s id
after it you’ll see a bunch of numbers
it would look summt like this

DCHAINID DCHAINDESCRIPTION ####   ####  ####  # # # # # # # # # # # #

change the second “####” to whatever you want the value to be, delete the number completely, even if it has . in it, and replace it with the value in gp

Read full topic
item.source: Changing what an item sells for in store?

item.title: Changing what an item sells for in store?
item.dc:creator: @justlikers justlikers
item.description:
@justlikers wrote:

or you could simply remove the command and make dragon chain spawns hidden and people can make money like that

Read full topic
